io.cloudstate.javasupport

Interface ClientActionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandContext, CommandContext, StreamedCommandContext<Output>, SubscriptionContext

    public interface ClientActionContext
extends Context
    Context that provides client actions, which include failing and forwarding.

    These contexts are typically made available in response to commands.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.RuntimeException fail(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Fail the command with the given message.
      void forward(ServiceCall to)
      Instruct the proxy to forward handling of this command to another entity served by this stateful function.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.cloudstate.javasupport.Context

        serviceCallFactory

    • Method Detail

      • fail

        java.lang.RuntimeException fail(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Fail the command with the given message.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - The error message to send to the client.

      • forward

        void forward(ServiceCall to)
        Instruct the proxy to forward handling of this command to another entity served by this stateful function.

        The command will be forwarded after successful completion of handling this command, including any persistence that this command does.

        ServiceCall instances can be created using the ServiceCallFactory obtained from any (including this) contexts Context.serviceCallFactory() method.

        Parameters:
        to - The service call to forward command processing to.
